function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in untreated wastewater samples","Impact":"Potential indication of a high prevalence of infection in the catchment basin","Mitigation":"Increased surveillance and testing of individuals in the catchment area","Technologies":"Wastewater surveillance technology for early detection of viral RNA","People":"Residents in the catchment area","Owner":"Public health authorities and local government"},{"Description":"High sensitivity of infection estimates to SARS-CoV-2 RNA copies in stool and wastewater","Impact":"Uncertainty and variability in estimating the prevalence of infections","Mitigation":"Enhanced monitoring of SARS-CoV-2 RNA levels in stool and wastewater","Technologies":"Advanced testing and surveillance technology for viral RNA in stool and wastewater","People":"Public health authorities and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Low sensitivity of infection estimates to the daily per capita flow rate of wastewater","Impact":"Limitations in using wastewater flow rate as a reliable indicator of infection prevalence","Mitigation":"Exploration of alternative indicators for infection prevalence in the population","Technologies":"Development of new indicators and surveillance methods for infection prevalence","People":"Public health agencies and epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions and public health agencies"}]}
